explains: n. 保护主义，贸易保护主义；贸易保护制度
wordGroup: trade protectionism 保护主义；贸易壁垒
regional protectionism 地方保护主义

sentences.en: The aim of the current round of talks is to promote free trade and to avert the threat of increasing protectionism.
sentences.cn: 本轮会谈的目的是促进自由贸易，消除日益加剧的贸易保护主义的威胁。

sentences.en: Fourthly, oppose trade protectionism and facilitate early, comprehensive and balanced outcomes of the Doha Round Negotiations.
sentences.cn: 第四，反对贸易保护主义，促进多哈回合谈判早日取得全面、平衡的成果。
